text:
What if you had your own Andrew Huberman or Joe Rogan in your pocket? 

Jellypod takes all your email newsletters (that you probably don't read) and transforms them into a daily podcast made just for you.

What do you think?

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends

user_info.name: Pierson Marks
user_info.description: building @jellypodai to solve newsletter overload | engineering @ucla | @_buildspace S5
